get.description: Retrieves the collection of DefaultRequestItem resources.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: ISO date (YYYY-MM-DD). If provided, filter demands where activityDate >= startDate. If endDate is also provided, filter activityDate between startDate and endDate (inclusive). If only endDate is provided (without startDate), it is ignored. If empty, behaves as not set.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: ISO date (YYYY-MM-DD). Used only when startDate is also provided; then filter activityDate <= endDate (inclusive). If empty or provided without startDate, it is ignored.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Export format. Supported: json (default), csv, excel.
